snippet: Katie Taylor, a 26-year-old born-again Christian, captivated a nation as she won Olympic gold in boxing. During her match, people across Ireland chanted, “Katie, Katie, Katie.”
abstract: Katie Taylor of Ireland, four times a world boxing champion in the lightweight division, five times the European champion, is also now an Olympic champion, beating Russia’s Sofya Ochigava in a nerve-racking 10-8 decision; the victory, only the ninth Olympic gold medal in Ireland’s history, comes like an inevitable cannon burst after years of drumroll.

byline.contributor: Douglas Dalby contributed reporting from Dublin.

lead_paragraph: Katie Taylor, a 26-year-old born-again Christian, captivated a nation as she won Olympic gold in boxing. During her match, people across Ireland chanted, “Katie, Katie, Katie.”

headline.seo: Katie Taylor, Pride of Ireland, Wins Boxing Gold Medal
